ygData.msgSnippet: gas = importPhase( rxnmech.cti ); nrxns = nReactions(gas); for k = 1:nrxns   setMultlipiler(gas, 0.0, k); % set rate constant of rxn k to zero

gas =3D importPhase('rxnmech.cti');
nrxns =3D nReactions(gas);

for k =3D 1=
:nrxns
=A0 setMultlipiler(gas, 0.0, k); % set rate constant of rxn k to zer=
o
=A0 disp([fwdRateConstants(gas)(k)]);=A0 % returns fwd rate constant =3D =
0.0
=A0 setMultlipiler(gas, 1.0, k); % set rate constant of rxn k back to i=
nitial value
